COVIDcast API Client

Delphi Group

2023-04-06

Source: vignettes/covidcast.Rmd
covidcast.Rmd

Delphi Epidata R API Client 

# remotes::install_github("cmu-delphi/epidatr")
library("epidatr")
library("magrittr")
covidcast_api <- covidcast_epidata()
epicall <- covidcast_api$sources$`fb-survey`$signals$smoothed_cli$call("nation", "us", epirange(20210405, 20210410))
epicall %>% fetch_classic()
## $epidata
##   geo_value       signal    source geo_type time_type time_value direction
## 1        us smoothed_cli fb-survey   nation       day 2021-04-05        NA
## 2        us smoothed_cli fb-survey   nation       day 2021-04-06        NA
## 3        us smoothed_cli fb-survey   nation       day 2021-04-07        NA
## 4        us smoothed_cli fb-survey   nation       day 2021-04-08        NA
## 5        us smoothed_cli fb-survey   nation       day 2021-04-09        NA

## [1] "success"
